languages.text: Смерть рода Версериан была встречена знатью Даргонуса молчаливым ликованием. Их хищный аппетит был распален. Утрата надзора за делами столичного флота, коррупция и воровство привели к экономическому спаду не только в столичном мире, но и на других планетах протектората.

The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.
languages.original_text: Смерть рода Версериан была встречена знатью Даргонуса молчаливым ликованием. Их хищный аппетит был распален. Утрата надзора за делами столичного флота, коррупция и воровство привели к экономическому спаду не только в столичном мире, но и на других планетах протектората.

traits.locale_text: The death of the Werserian dynasty was met with the silent glee of the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was awakened. The loss of control over the capital fleet, corruption, and larceny induced the economic fall not only on a capital world but on other protectorate planets as well.

The death of the Werserian dynasty was met with the silent glee of the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was awakened. The loss of control over the capital fleet, corruption, and larceny induced the economic fall not only on a capital world but on other protectorate planets as well.

The death of the Werserian Dynasty was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was stoked. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

The death of the Werserian Dynasty was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was stoked. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

languages.text: 韦尔森家族就此陨落，达戈努斯的其他贵族默默地弹冠相庆。他们贪婪的胃口越发膨胀，导致贪腐横行，最终导致首都舰队失去了控制。首都世界的经济最终发生了崩溃，继而导致整个王朝的经济毁于一旦。
languages.original_text: The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

traits.locale_text: 韦尔森王朝就此陨落，达戈努斯的其他贵族默默地弹冠相庆。他们贪婪的胃口越发膨胀，导致贪腐横行，最终导致首都舰队失去了控制。首都世界的经济最终发生了崩溃，继而导致整个王朝的经济毁于一旦。

languages.text: Der Tod des Hauses Werserian wurde vom Adel auf Dargonus mit stiller Häme registriert. Ihr gieriger Hunger war geweckt. Verderbnis, Diebstahl und der Verlust der Kontrolle über die Flotte der Hauptstadt führte zu einem wirtschaftlichen Zusammenbruch — nicht nur auf der Hauptwelt, sondern im gesamten Protektorat.
languages.original_text: The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

traits.locale_text: Der Tod der Werserian-Dynastie wurde vom Adel auf Dargonus mit stiller Häme registriert. Ihr gieriger Hunger war geweckt. Verderbnis, Diebstahl und der Verlust der Kontrolle über die Flotte der Hauptstadt führte zu einem wirtschaftlichen Zusammenbruch — nicht nur auf der Hauptwelt, sondern im gesamten Protektorat.

languages.text: La noblesse de Dargonus se réjouit silencieusement de la disparition de la maison Werserian. Sa faim vorace fut ainsi attisée. La corruption, le vol et la perte de contrôle sur la flotte de la capitale entraînèrent un effondrement économique non seulement dans le monde-capitale, mais aussi à travers tout le protectorat.
languages.original_text: The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

traits.locale_text: La noblesse de Dargonus se réjouit silencieusement de la disparition de la dynastie Werserian. Sa faim vorace fut ainsi attisée. La corruption, le vol et la perte de contrôle sur la flotte de la capitale entraînèrent un effondrement économique non seulement dans le monde-capitale, mais aussi à travers tout le protectorat.

languages.text: La muerte de la casa Werserian se celebró en silencio entre la nobleza de Dargonus. Este incidente avivó su voracidad, y la corrupción, la malversación y la pérdida de control de la flota de la capital causaron el colapso económico no solo de Dargonus, sino del protectorado al completo.
languages.original_text: The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

traits.locale_text: La muerte de la dinastía Werserian se celebró en silencio entre la nobleza de Dargonus. Este incidente avivó su voracidad, y la corrupción, la malversación y la pérdida de control de la flota de la capital causaron el colapso económico no solo de Dargonus, sino del protectorado al completo.

languages.text: ウェルザリアン家の滅亡は、ダルゴナスの貴族たちを静かな歓喜に包みこんだ。彼らの貪欲な飢えが刺激されたのだ。汚職、窃盗、首都艦隊の支配権の喪失は、首都惑星だけでなく、保護領全体の経済崩壊につながった。
languages.original_text: The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン家の滅亡は、ダルゴナスの貴族たちを静かな歓喜に包みこんだ。彼らの貪欲な飢えが刺激されたのだ。汚職、窃盗、首都艦隊の支配権の喪失は、首都惑星だけでなく、保護領全体の経済崩壊につながった。

languages.text: Werserian Hanesi'nin ölümü, Dargonus soyluları arasında sessiz bir sevinçle karşılandı. Doymak bilmezlik alıp başını gitti. Yozlaşma, hırsızlık ve başkent filosunun kontrolünün kaybı; yalnızca başdünya ekonomisinin değil, tüm protektoranınkinin de çökmesine yol açtı.
languages.original_text: The death of House Werserian was met with silent glee by the nobility on Dargonus. Their ravenous hunger was whetted. Corruption, larceny, and the loss of control over the capital fleet led to economic collapse not only on the capital world but throughout the protectorate as well.

traits.locale_text: Werserian Hanesi'nin ölümü, Dargonus soyluları arasında sessiz bir sevinçle karşılandı. Doymak bilmezlik alıp başını gitti. Yozlaşma, hırsızlık ve başkent filosunun kontrolünün kaybedilmesi, yalnızca başdünya ekonomisinin değil, tüm protektoranın ekonomisinin çökmesine yol açtı.
